npcs.name: ghost
npcs.description: A tired looking Ghost is standing in the corner of the room
npcs.long_description: The Ghost seems to be a Tall gentleman wearing clothes from the 80s. His eyes stare into distance, not you, and mumbling something. Maybe I should talk to him.
dialogue: ...I need a doll for my daughter...
...I lost my daughter's gift...I must find it...

item_interactions.dialogue: Oh! I was looking for this! Thanks!
